response.overview: Frank Cross is a wildly successful television executive whose cold ambition and curmudgeonly nature has driven away the love of his life. But after firing a staff member on Christmas Eve, Frank is visited by a series of ghosts who give him a chance to re-evaluate his actions and right the wrongs of his past.
response.tagline: The spirits will move you in odd and hysterical ways.
response.title: Scrooged

cast.name: Peter Sellers
cast.character: Viewed on TV screen acting in 1964 film Carol For Another Christmas uncredited
